noun.definition: A room or building in which goods are manufactured or repaired.
noun.example: He has a carpentry workshop in the garage.

noun.definition: A meeting at which a group of people engage in intensive discussion and activity on a particular subject or project.

verb.definition: To present a performance of (a dramatic work) in a workshop; to develop (something) in a workshop.
verb.example: They workshopped the play for months.

usage_examples: The artist has a workshop in the city center.
